TextView.android:text:
To get started with PGP ID you will first of all need a PGP certificate, you can generate one in the 'OpenKeychain' app. You will then need to share your public key to the server that you want to authenticate with.
The server may then use either the open api provided by RTEK to authenticate you or setup their own server, if they choose the second alternative you will also need to add their server to the server list.
